类 TMReader

reader.TMReader

  • 方法详细资料

    • loadTuringMachineFrom

      public void loadTuringMachineFrom(String filePath)
      Load Turing Machine from a file path. Check the file is a desc file, and read its String to the raw.
      指定者:
      loadTuringMachineFrom 在接口中 UTMController
      参数:
      filePath - A string representing the absolute path to the TM

    • setAnimation

      public void setAnimation(boolean animation)
      Set if it show animation.
      参数:
      animation - show animation or not.

    • isAnimation

      public boolean isAnimation()
      Check if it shows animation.
      返回:
      show animation or not.

    • runUTM

      public void runUTM(String input)
      Read the input, create a polymorphic instance of controller to run teh Universal Turing Machine.
      指定者:
      runUTM 在接口中 UTMController
      参数:
      input - A string representing the input for the loaded TM.

    • setInput

      input - input
